verses.verse: Let a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3049>regard<s%> us in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner,<s%> as <S%G5257>servants<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G3623>stewards<s%> of the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
In <S%G5602>this<s%> <S%G5602>case,<s%> <S%G3062>moreover,<s%> it is <S%G523>required<s%> of <S%G3623>stewards<s%> that <S%G5100>one<s%> be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G4103>trustworthy.<s%>

But to me it is a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>small<s%> <S%G1646>thing<s%> that I should be <S%G350>examined<s%> by you, <S%G2228>or<s%> by [any] <S%G442>human<s%> <S%G2250>court;<s%> in <S%G235>fact,<s%> I do not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G350>examine<s%> <S%G1683>myself.<s%>

For I <S%G4924>am<s%> <S%G4924>conscious<s%> of <S%G3762>nothing<s%> against <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> I am not by <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1344>acquitted;<s%> but the one who <S%G350>examines<s%> me is the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> do not go on <S%G2919>passing<s%> <S%G2919>judgment<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time,<s%> [but wait] <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G5461>bring<s%> to <S%G5461>light<s%> the <S%G2927>things<s%> <S%G2927>hidden<s%> in the <S%G4655>darkness<s%> and <S%G5319>disclose<s%> the <S%G1012>motives<s%> of [men's] <S%G2588>hearts;<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> man's <S%G1868>praise<s%> will <S%G1096>come<s%> to him from <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I have <S%G3345>figuratively<s%> <S%G3345>applied<s%> to <S%G1683>myself<s%> and <S%G625>Apollos<s%> for your <S%G1223>sakes,<s%> that in us you might <S%G3129>learn<s%> not to <S%G5228>exceed<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> is <S%G1125>written,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of you might become <S%G5448>arrogant<s%> in <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G2087>other.<s%>

For <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1252>regards<s%> you as <S%G1252>superior<s%>? And <S%G5101>what<s%> do you <S%G2192>have<s%> that you did not <S%G2983>receive<s%>? But <S%G1487>if<s%> you did <S%G2983>receive<s%> it, <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2744>boast<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> you had not <S%G2983>received<s%> it?

You are <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2880>filled,<s%> you have <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G4147>become<s%> <S%G4147>rich,<s%> you have <S%G936>become<s%> <S%G936>kings<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> us; and [I] <S%G3785>would<s%> <S%G1065>indeed<s%> that you had <S%G936>become<s%> <S%G936>kings<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that we <S%G2532>also<s%> might <S%G4821>reign<s%> with you.

For, I <S%G1380>think,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G584>exhibited<s%> us <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> of <S%G2078>all,<s%> as <S%G1935>men<s%> <S%G1935>condemned<s%> to <S%G1935>death;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> we have <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G2302>spectacle<s%> to the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G32>angels<s%> and to <S%G444>men.<s%>

We are <S%G3474>fools<s%> for <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake,<s%> but you are <S%G5429>prudent<s%> in Christ; we are <S%G772>weak,<s%> but you are <S%G2478>strong;<s%> you are <S%G1741>distinguished,<s%> but we are <S%G820>without<s%> <S%G820>honor.<s%>

To <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G737>present<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> we are <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3983>hungry<s%> and <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> and are <S%G1130>poorly<s%> <S%G1130>clothed,<s%> and are <S%G2852>roughly<s%> <S%G2852>treated,<s%> and are <S%G790>homeless;<s%>

and we <S%G2872>toil,<s%> <S%G2038>working<s%> with our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands;<s%> when we are <S%G3058>reviled,<s%> we <S%G2127>bless;<s%> when we are <S%G1377>persecuted,<s%> we <S%G430>endure;<s%>

when we are <S%G7049>slandered,<s%> we try to <S%G3870>conciliate;<s%> we have <S%G1096>become<s%> as the <S%G4027>scum<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G4067>dregs<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> [even] <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now.<s%>
I do not <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to <S%G1788>shame<s%> you, but to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> you as my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5043>children.<s%>

For <S%G1437>if<s%> you were to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3463>countless<s%> <S%G3807>tutors<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> [you would] not [have] <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3962>fathers;<s%> for in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> I <S%G1080>became<s%> your <S%G1080>father<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>
I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> be <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of me.

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> to you <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is my <S%G27>beloved<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and he will <S%G363>remind<s%> you of my <S%G3598>ways<s%> which are in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as I <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3837>everywhere<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1577>church.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> have become <S%G5448>arrogant,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> I were not <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you.

But I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G5030>soon,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2309>wills,<s%> and I shall <S%G1097>find<s%> out, not the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G5448>arrogant,<s%> but their <S%G1411>power.<s%>
For the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> does not consist in <S%G3056>words,<s%> but in <S%G1411>power.<s%>
<S%G5101>What<s%> do you <S%G2309>desire<s%>? Shall I <S%G2064>come<s%> to you with a <S%G4464>rod<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> with <S%G26>love<s%> and a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4240>gentleness<s%>?
